title: Concrete Enhancements
name: Michael Hillan
text: Craig and his team did an amazing job resuscitating our 2-year old driveway that had started to erode.  Seams were crumbling and holes were appearing in multiple sections.  Craig's work to smooth the surface, refill and repair then seal with multiple coats of a beautiful color-matched sealant was nothing short of masterful.  And the work he did to transform the front porch from a bare concrete slap to a gorgeous entry of tumbled stone was pure artistry.  Thank you so much Craig!  See you when you come back to transform the back patio!

title: Concrete Enhancements
name: maria candelaria rivera
text: Concrete Enhancements did my garage floor with a tile-look pattern, and it came out great! Super clean and professional work. Highly recommend them for any concrete coating.

title: Concrete Enhancements
name: Danny Wicker
text: I know Craig and have seen his work. He does amazing work and is very trustworthy. Not only will the work be great but it will be done by a great guy!

title: Concrete Enhancements
name: Emily Blechert
text: Concrete Enhancements is very professional, best quality and awesome Craftsman. They are  hard working and very  determined to make your project look amazing.

title: Concrete Enhancements
name: Oscar Real
text:
Our front walkway was long overdue for a makeover, and Craig from Concrete Enhancements absolutely brought it back to life. What used to be a dull slab of concrete is now a beautiful entryway that looks like something straight out of a design magazine. He created a hand-cut flagstone pattern with a mix of warm tans, beiges, and sandstone hues, all framed with real brick borders that match the front of our house perfectly.

It’s hard to describe how much character and warmth it adds — every time we walk up to the door, it feels like a brand-new home. The surface is smooth, sturdy, and has that natural stone look that impresses everyone who visits.

Craig doesn’t just pour concrete — he creates art. You can tell he takes pride in his work and genuinely wants you to be amazed by the end result. Our neighbors have already asked who did it, and I’m more than happy to point them toward Concrete Enhancements. They don’t just do good work; they create lasting impressions.

title: Concrete Enhancements
name: Dave Nash
text: Craig did an awesome job resurfacing our old & battered driveway. It looks better than new, and is the nicest driveway in the neighborhood now! Thanks again.

title: Concrete Enhancements
name: Tina Clark
text: Craig and his team did an amazing job, designing and completing our patio concrete flooring. Several neighbors have hired him as a result of the work completed on our new home.

title: Concrete Enhancements
name: Chris Clark
text: Craig, We can't say "THANK YOU" enough for the way you and your team added priceless beauty to the patio and porch of our home! We are the talk of the neighborhood. Not only is your work a true "work of art", it is very durable and lasting. Now, we must have you come back and finish our garage floor. I know it will be amazing when you are done!  We are so glad that our friends referred you to us. You are a true artist!

title: Concrete Enhancements
name: Shave Bennett
text: We used concrete enhancements to remake the walkway at our church. Craig provided a realistic quote that he stuck to, quality craftsmanship, and was good at keeping us up to date on his progress. I would highly recommend his company for any concrete restoration needs you might have.

title: Concrete Enhancements
name: Tamara Winstead
text: We hired Concrete Enhancements this summer to refinish our pool patio concrete. Our concrete was old, shabby, chipped, flaky, pitted and in  need of dire repair. It was awful. Craigs company was a God-send. He was professional, knowledgeable and reasonable. The outcome was even more than we ever dreamed! We highly recommend this company.

title: Concrete Enhancements
name: Jeff Johnson
text: We had a nightmare concrete job done and Concrete Enhancements saved us from having to tear out and replace it all while saving us money and providing us with a beautiful alternative. It was a blessing in disguise.

title: Concrete Enhancements
name: M M
text: Thank You Craig, the concrete wood look design looks amazing on our patio and has been receiving a lot of positive feedback. We have and will continue to recommend Concrete Enhancements to my friends and anyone else needing concrete services.
